ygData.subject: EVerquest Beta End =(
ygData.msgSnippet: I m really sad eq beta is over, it will stick with me for a long time. Especially the end.. except.. I didn t get to see much, i died seconds before reaching
ygData.messageBody:
I'm really sad eq beta is over, it will stick with me for a long time.
Especially the end.. except.. I didn't get to see much, i died seconds
before reaching the battlefield on karanas ( test server )

But I did see many things.. odd and awsome
I watched a war rage on Fennin Ro in the Desert of Ro.
And the beginning of a war on the karanas.. saw a god of evil and one of
good.. and hundreds of bodies.. laid bare across the landscape. And what I
saw last.. of most odd things.. was all of us having fun =)

Daledor, Human-Bard, Fennin Ro..

Living on in final
